scripts.start:gateway: start cmd /k "cd server\gateway && npm run dev"
scripts.start:auth: start cmd /k "cd server\services\auth && npm run dev"
scripts.start:user: start cmd /k "cd server\services\user && npm run dev"
scripts.start:product: start cmd /k "cd server\services\product && npm run dev"
scripts.start:all: npm run start:auth && npm run start:user && npm run start:product && npm run start:gateway
